title: The art of long-form audio narrative
description: This tipsheet provides guidance on how to get the right recordings for a compelling audio narrative, including getting the necessary information, setting the scene, and bringing emotion to the story. It covers who to interview, what to record, when and where to do it, and why it's essential to keep recording.
